example.parse: (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM فرح) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الضوء))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسكن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC التربة)))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ و) (S (NP-TPC-2 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الفضاء)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يلاحق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC حركة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السكون))))) (PUNC .))

frameset.edef: to calm down, to cool down, to rest

role.argrole: entity or things that are calmed

frameset.edef: to trust in, to rely on

role.argrole: in whom or in what (come after إلى)
